name: Daily Registry Updater

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 2 * * *"   # every day at 02:00 UTC
  workflow_dispatch:       # allow manual run from the Actions tab

jobs:
  update:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20

      # Install deps only for the updater (faster, avoids root installs)
      - name: Install updater deps
        working-directory: updater
        run: npm ci

      # --- NEW: Sync PRO Europe members into your Pro table
      - name: Sync PRO Europe members
        working-directory: updater
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE }}
          NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }} # optional, if your code reads this
        run: node src/fetchers/proe_members.mjs

      # --- NEW: Generate CSVs from the official PRO Europe fees PDF
      - name: Generate PRO Europe fee CSVs
        working-directory: updater
        run: node src/fetchers/proe_fees_to_csv.mjs

      # --- NEW: Import the generated fees into your DB
      - name: Import generated fee CSVs
        working-directory: updater
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE }}
        run: node src/import_tariffs.mjs ../data/tariffs/2025/generated/proe

      # (Optional) Your existing updater step for other sources
      - name: Run updater (DB upserts)
        working-directory: updater
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE }}
        run: node src/main.mjs --all

      # Export JSON and upload to Supabase Storage (public_/registry/registry.json)
      - name: Export & upload registry.json
        working-directory: updater
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE }}
          NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }} # optional
        run: node src/export.mjs

      - name: Install root deps for tariffs builder
  	run: npm ci

      - name: Build tariffs JSON from CSVs
  	run: npm run build:tariffs

      - name: Commit updated tariffs JSON
  	run: |
    	  git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
    	  git config user.email "41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
    	  git add public/data/tariffs-2025.json
   	  git commit -m "chore: update tariffs-2025.json" || echo "No changes to commit."
    	  git push
